name: iceworld (circle0)
description:
"Iceworld is a lovely platform game in 3D in which you need to rescue the cute whale who has been kidnapped by the Yeti. Throughout the game, you will visit different areas of lovely snowed landscapes in the mountains with waterfalls and ice lakes. The scenes are also full of bridges which you need to cross and enemies that you will need to fight. Killing the enemies will provide you with necessary items like keys or tickets that help you unlock other areas in the game."

Iceworld is abandonware

I found Iceworld's source code while looking through the (also abandoned) DreamGame Engine.

Iceworld and the DreamGame Engine were made and developed by Dream-Up

Compiled by circle0
